sentences.en: A kind of singularly perturbed boundary value problem is investigated.
sentences.cn: 考虑一类奇异摄动边值问题.

sentences.en: About Queen Victoria, she had been singularly ignorant, despite her royal cousin.
sentences.cn: 她虽然是皇亲,维多利亚女王也是很奇怪而忽略了她.

sentences.en: By the standards of history, his execution in 399 B.C. was singularly humane.
sentences.cn: 按照历史的标准来看, 公元前399年处死他的方式是异常人道的.

sentences.en: During the bus trip she was singularly quiet, not at all her usual self.
sentences.cn: 路上,她一反常态,竟非常沉默.

sentences.en: He has singularly failed to live up to his promises.
sentences.cn: 他显然没有履行自己的诺言。

sentences.en: Her exultation being quite undisguised was singularly inoffensive.
sentences.cn: 她的欢欣因为是完全不加掩饰的,所以格外不惹人反感.

sentences.en: Higher - order singularly perturbed ordinary differential equations have important applications in Fluid Dynamics.
sentences.cn: 高阶奇异常微分方程在流体动力学中也有重要的应用.

sentences.en: His conversation, when he was disposed to please, was singularly interesting and original.
sentences.cn: 他的谈吐, 在他想取悦对方的时候, 真是说得娓娓动听,别具一格.

sentences.en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentences.cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。

sentences.en: Its immense area was singularly adapted to its purpose.
sentences.cn: 宽广的会场和它的目的很相称.

sentences.en: The child of nature shows singularly little awareness of the charms of his existence.
sentences.cn: 大自然的儿女对于生存的魅力一无所知.

sentences.en: The trees beneath which she sat were singularly battered , rude, and wild.
sentences.cn: 复在她头上的那一丛树,异样的褴褛,粗糙, 犷野.

sentences.en: These warts are non - malignant, occurring either singularly or scattered in clusters.
sentences.cn: 这些湿疣并非恶性, 单独出现或分散成簇.

sentences.en: This treatment was singularly inappropriate in her case.
sentences.cn: 就她的情况来说这种治疗方法极不适合.

sentences.en: We did some singularly boring experiment.
sentences.cn: 我们做了一些非常乏味的试验.

sentences.en: We had at this time in Washington a singularly gifted and influential Ambassador.
sentences.cn: 这时,我们在华盛顿有一位才能卓越而且颇有影响的大使.

words.tran_cn: 单数的；单一的；非凡的；异常的
异常地；非常地；令人无法理解地

trans.tran_cn: 非常地，格外地，奇怪地，异常地
trans.tran_en: in a way that is very noticeable or unusual
